clothes.title: REVOLUTIONARY TIGHTS - CARAMEL
clothes.description: A true signature legging in the 4254 collection.  Fashion, function and style all wrapped in one übercool piece.  Whether you want to take a relaxing yoga class or simply enjoy a girls night out, this legging will have you look and feel your best.     Fabric made with circular knit with a 4-way stretch, breathable, light weight, offering a second skin feeling and figure correcting.

clothes.title: LUCKY NUMBERS BRA - PINK
clothes.description: An artfully designed sports bra with the support one expect for a medium to heavy workout.  The one-shoulder silhouette is one of the most popular styles in the brands palette and has been worn both in the gym or mixed in an offbeat, fun look.  Wear yours in combination with black leggings or pump up the volume with your pink Lucky Numbers tights.   Fabric made with circular knit with a 4-way stretch, breathable, light weight, offering a second skin feeling.

clothes.title: OVERLONG PERFORMANCE LONG SLEEVES
clothes.description: A classic look for your staple wardrobe. It is designed with a turtleneck and a shiny 4-way stretch fabric that perfectly contours to all body types. Our Long Sleeves are created to withstand the toughest of workouts, but often worn to look effortless with your coveted denim styles.

clothes.title: WAVE BRA - BLACK
clothes.description: The bestseller bra that keeps finding it’s way into your wardrobe.  Structured beautifully with a sweetheart neckline, designed for maximum support .  Opt for this subtle eyecatcher to mix with your daily attire.     Fabric made with circular knit with a 4-way stretch, breathable, light weight, offering a second skin feeling and figure correcting.

clothes.title: WAVE LEGGINGS
clothes.description: Get moving in our wave leggings, a full length legging, perfect for your high performance activities.  Fabric made with circular knit with a 4-way stretch, breathable, light weight, offering a second skin feeling.
